EmailTemplate.name: Contactless Dine In.Confirmation email
EmailTemplate.subject: Email Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
It’s official! You’re on the list and on your way to bringing contactless service to your restaurant. We’ll reach out with updates and next steps over the next few weeks.
More options that provide safe experiences for your staff and customers
Need more contactless options? We’re always working on innovative technologies to meet the needs of our customers during this difficult time. Click below to find out what’s new: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
